## Source: ossf-package-analysis (436b41e95f0ede5a35cad0f9ccd621c6e31fd348c8ea9166fe088f66937bc32d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'kubernetes-agent' @ 2.40.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
